original_text: Then Jesus went back across the Jordan to the place where John had been baptizing in the early days. There he stayed,
korean_text: 다시 요단 강 저편 요한이 처음으로 세례 베풀던 곳에 가사 거기 거하시니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus went back across the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 요단 강 건너편으로 돌아가셨다

sentences.original_text: to the place where John had been baptizing
